entry.title: Government takeover of stake in Amulsar gold mine delayed: THIS WEEK IN BUSINESS

media:group.media:title: Government takeover of stake in Amulsar gold mine delayed: THIS WEEK IN BUSINESS
media:group.media:description:
๐ UATE, an Armenia-based organization representing more than 150 tech companies, warned law enforcementโs raid on the taxi company GG is fueling concern for foreign investors. ๐ The Armenian government set a new deadline for plans to take a 12.5% stake in the long-stalled Amulsar gold mine project, which was initially set to be finalized by the end of March, but has now been pushed back to September 1 due to โtechnical problems.โ ๐ The government is in talks with Masdar, the Emirati state-owned renewable energy company, in an effort to salvage a major solar power plant deal. entry.title: Armenia recognizes Palestine, reaffirms support for two-state solution

media:group.media:description:

entry.title: Ambassador Nina Hachigian talks US local diplomacy and supporting democracies

media:group.media:title: Ambassador Nina Hachigian talks US local diplomacy and supporting democracies
media:group.media:description:
Ambassador Nina Hachigian, U.S. Special Representative for City and State Diplomacy, sits down with CivilNetโs Mark Dovich to talk about the State Departmentโs engagement with local officials around the world, including new efforts in Armenia. They also discuss the state of relations between Washington and Yerevan more broadly, as well as what it means personally for Armenian Americans like Ambassador Hachigian to work on these issues.

entry.title: ิฑีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีจ ีญีกีฒีกีฒีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีกีดีกีบีกึึีกีฏ ีบีกีตีดีกีถีกีฃีซึ ีนีซ ีธึีฆีธึีดโค ิฒีฅีถีซีกีดีซีถ ีีธีฒีธีฝีตีกีถ

media:group.media:title: ิฑีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีจ ีญีกีฒีกีฒีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีกีดีกีบีกึึีกีฏ ีบีกีตีดีกีถีกีฃีซึ ีนีซ ีธึีฆีธึีดโค ิฒีฅีถีซีกีดีซีถ ีีธีฒีธีฝีตีกีถ
media:group.media:description:
ิฑีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีจ ีนีซ ึีกีถีฏีกีถีธึีด ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีญีกีฒีกีฒีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีกีดีกีบีกึึีกีฏ ีบีกีตีดีกีถีกีฃีซึ ีฏีถึีฅีฌ, ึีธีญีกึีฅีถีจ ีฏีกึีธีฒ ีง ีทึีปีกีถีกีฏีกีตีซีถ ีฐีกีดีกีฑีกีตีถีกีฃีซึ ีฝีฟีธึีกีฃึีฅีฌ, ีถีทีธึีด ีง ยซิฑีีิป ิฑึีดีฅีถีซีกยป ีฐีฅีฟีกีฆีธีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีฅีถีฟึีธีถีซ ีกีพีกีฃ ึีธึีฑีกีฃีฅีฟ ิฒีฅีถีซีกีดีซีถ ีีธีฒีธีฝีตีกีถีจ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ีฟีกีฒีกีพีกึีธึีดี ีบีกึีฆีกีขีกีถีฅีฌีธีพ ีฅึีฏีธึีฝีซ ีดีซีปึ ีฟีกึีขีฅึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจึ ีึีก ีฏีกึีฎีซึีธีพี ิฑีี-ีจ ีกีดีฅีถีกีทีกีฟีถ ีง ีทีกีฐีกีฃึีฃีผีพีกีฎ ีฐีกีต-ีกีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีกีฏีกีถ ีธึึีง ึีกีฝีฟีกีฉีฒีฉีซ ีฝีฟีธึีกีฃึีดีกีดีข, ีซีถีนีจ ีฉีธึีตีฌ ีฏีฟีก ีถีกึ ีฏีกึีฃีกีพีธึีฅีฌ ีฐีกีต-ีฉีธึึึีกีฏีกีถ ีฐีกึีกีขีฅึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีจึ ีีกีฒีกึีกีฃีฅีฟีจ ีญีธีฝีธึีด ีง ีถีกึ ีฐีกีฒีธึีคีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีญีถีคึีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถี ีกีถีคึีกีคีกีผีถีกีฌีธีพ ีีตีธึีถีซึีธึีด ีดีซีปีกีฆีฃีกีตีซีถ ีฏีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีถีฅึีฃึีกีพีพีกีฎีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีฅีผีกีถีฏีกึีซีถึ
